PERSONA:
meet james, a 58-year-old white man living in a metropolitan area of the south atlantic region. he is a college graduate with some post-graduate education and works in a field that provides him with an upper-income salary of over $100,000 per year.

james is currently separated from his wife, and he identifies as an agnostic with no religious affiliation or participation in religious services. despite his lack of religious beliefs, he holds moderate political views and is a registered democrat voter.

in his personal life, james is an avid internet user, spending a significant portion of his time online. however, he does not engage in any regular volunteer work or community service activities.

james takes pride in his american citizenship, having been born and raised in the united states. he values his education and the opportunities it has provided him, leading to his successful career and comfortable lifestyle.

while james may come across as reserved or private about his personal life, he is generally open-minded and respectful of others' beliefs and backgrounds. he enjoys the conveniences and cultural offerings of metropolitan living while maintaining a balanced and moderate approach to life.
